articles.author: AP
articles.title: ‘Israel is committing genocide in Gaza,’ South Africa tells the UN top court - Hindustan Times
articles.description: During opening statements, South African lawyers said the latest Gaza war is part of decades of Israeli oppression of Palestinians. | World News
articles.content: In a case that strikes at the heart of Israel's national identity, South Africa formally accused the country of committing genocide against Palestinians and pleaded Thursday with the United Nations t… [+7475 chars]
